MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL23 postcode area of Bala, affecting properties in Llanuwchllyn and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.27PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of addition resources required on site and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, with a generator, by 10.30PM We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.48PM on 25th February 2021.
